messages.subject: Kings Corner / Dice
messages.msgSnippet: Hey thanks Pam, Those were some really cool ideas. The more I play I think wow I could really make this more interesting :0) Anyway, I have a friend who loves
messages.messageBody:
Hey thanks Pam,
Those were some really cool ideas. The more I play I think wow I
could really make this more interesting :0) Anyway, I have a friend
who loves different kinds of dice and I bought two cans from her
catolog / web site (essential Mothers - I think ?) they are fron
Germany and are so cute. One has #'s and there is a little booklet
for it with some ideas. The other one has the alphabet (all sides)on
it and I'm not quite sure what to play with that game.
I really love the games because they are fun and Hasbro has come out
with a multitude of games this year (near me anayway)they must be on
to the home school community LOL........................
I would love to hear from more of you about your favorite games that
you and your children play.
Thanks,
Sonya
